title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When opening a java editor and right-clicking on the left vertical ruler, a popup menu should appear to add breakpoints/marks, etc. However, in Photon, this menu does not appear.
OB:
1) Open a java editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler

There is no popup menu that appears to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
EB: When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a java editor, a popup menu should appear with options to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
SR:
1) Open a java editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler
3) Verify that a popup menu appears with options to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
